nodes.name: getProxyImplementation

devdoc.author: Stability Labs Pty. Ltd.
devdoc.details: The contract has a delyed upgradability. The Governor can propose a new implementation         for a proxy contract. After 1 week of opt-out delay, upgrade request can be accepted         and upgrade of contract is performed.         Part of the code taken from OpenZeppelin-SDK's ProxyAdmin.sol

acceptUpgradeRequest(address).details: The Governor can accept upgrade request after opt-out delay over. The function is     `payable`, to forward ETH to initialize function call upon upgrade.

cancelUpgrade(address).details: The Governor can cancel any existing upgrade request.

params._proxy: The proxy address of the existing request

getProxyAdmin(address).details: Returns the admin of a proxy. Only the admin can query it.
getProxyAdmin(address).return: The address of the current admin of the proxy.

getProxyImplementation(address).details: Returns the current implementation of a proxy. This is needed because only the proxy admin can query it.
getProxyImplementation(address).return: The address of the current implementation of the proxy.

proposeUpgrade(address,address,bytes).details: The Governor can propose a new contract implementation for a given proxy.

params._data: calldata to execute initialization function upon upgrade
params._proxy: Proxy address which is to be upgraded

devdoc.title: DelayedProxyAdmin

userdoc.notice: Proxy admin contract to upgrade the upgradable contracts. The upgradable contracts         are transparent proxy contracts from OpenZeppelin-SDK.
